about_the_game:
Portal Factory is an open-world factory-building adventure where exploration meets engineering! Play solo or with friends as you dive into a vibrant world. Harness the power of advanced technology to build complex factory systems that automate resource gathering, crafting, and production. As your operations grow, explore the far reaches of the world to uncover hidden dungeons, filled with mysteries and valuable rewards.

  • BASE BUILDING: Design and optimize your factory layout as you automate the production of resources. Expand your operations from small workshops to sprawling industrial hubs.

  • DIVERSE BIOMES: From lush forests to barren deserts, venture through a variety of landscapes, each with unique resources and challenges.

  • PROCEDURALLY DUNGEONS: Dive into dungeons and explore the unknown. Discover ancient secrets, rare resources, and powerful technology to enhance your factory.

  • MULTIPLAYER: Team up with friends and collaborate to create massive production networks or explore the world together.

  • ENVIRONMENTAL HAZARDS: Manage your factory efficiently while facing environmental hazards and uncovering hidden dangers beneath the surface.

Are you ready to take your factory to the next level? Build, explore, and uncover the mysteries that lie beyond the portals!
